project_abstract.cdata: The Anning Valley Agricultural Development Project aims at increasing the agricultural production and marketability in the area, with a particular emphasis at reducing poverty. The project fosters the effective use of natural resources, through the development of mountainous areas and environmental improvement. The key components of the project are: a) water resources development, consisting of three sub-components - Manshuiwan, Huangqiao & Shengli - which include the construction of weirs, high dam and canal systems, both for irrigation and hydroelectric power stations; b) the development of land and technology for crop development, aimed at increasing provincial food production; c) orchard development to improve the quality and quantity of fruits in the project area; d) the sericulture development, designed to be market-driven, will increase and improve silk production; e) the livestock development aims at reducing farm poverty, generating income activity for women as well; f) the agro-processing component, provides essential linkages among production, processing and marketing of farm products; and g) the institutional development component will strengthen institutional issues for agricultural research and extension, as well as environmental protection.

P049665.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>安宁河流域农业发展项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目旨在增加安宁河流域的农业产量，增强其农产品的适销性，并将尤其重视减贫。本项目将通过发展山区和改善环境促进对自然资源的有效利用。本项目的主要子项目是：（1）水资源开发子项目，包含漫水湾、黄桥和胜利三个二级子项目，其内容包括围堰、高坝和瞿溪建设，目的是发展灌溉和开发水电；（2）土地开发和农作物开发技术子项目，其宗旨是增加地方粮食产量；（3）果园发展子项目，其宗旨是提高项目区水果的质量，增加水果数量；（4）养蚕业发展子项目，其设计初衷是由市场驱动发展，增加并改进蚕丝生产；（5）畜牧业发展子项目，其宗旨是降低养殖户贫困率，为妇女增加创收活动；（6）农产品加工子项目，其宗旨是为农产品生产、加工和销售等环节建立联系；（7）机构发展子项目，其将加强农业研究和农技推广服务以及环境保护方面的机构安排。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
